get.summary: Retrieve Marketing Reports Ad Impact Graph data
get.description: This API endpoint provides data related to the impact of advertisements on the company's profit. It allows you to visualize the effects of various advertising activities on key financial metrics such as gross sales, ad sales, ad spends, COGS (Cost of Goods Sold), Amazon fees, other fees, organic sales, and net profit. The data can be used to analyze the effectiveness of different ad campaigns and make informed decisions to optimize marketing strategies for improved profitability.

get.description: This API endpoint provides data related to accounts profile

This endpoint allows users to retrieve information about tasks that are currently queued for processing. Tasks in the queue typically refer to computational or operational tasks that are awaiting execution or processing. The response from this endpoint would provide details about the tasks in the queue, such as their status, priority, creation time, and any associated metadata.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Add Queue to filter the search

parameters.name: status_list
parameters.description: Array of Status list to filter the search
